name: Dell Inc.
bossPosition: Senior Vice President, Legal - Europe, Middle East & Africa
goal:
Dell is one of the world’s leading technology companies, providing cutting-edge IT services, solutions and products for government institutions, large enterprises, small and medium-sized enterprises, and consumers.

Since 2016, Dell is part of Dell Technologies, a family of strategically aligned businesses providing the essential infrastructure for digital business and IT transformation. Our family of businesses includes Dell, EMC II, VMware, Pivotal, SecureWorks, RSA and VirtuStream.
With headquarters in Round Rock, Texas, Dell Technologies operates globally and employs some 25,000 people in the European Union.

As a global and European technology leader, Dell supports policies that enable Europe’s digital economy to develop, support entrepreneurship and help European citizens and businesses participate in the information society.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Environment, Foreign affairs and security policy, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
• Digital economy (e.g. Cloud, Big Data, IoT)
• Digital Single Market
• Privacy and cybersecurity
• Entrepreneurship
• Digital skills
• Trade and customs issues
• Environmental and supply-chain issues
• IPR issues and copyright levies
• Consumer affairs
• Tax
